This is gonna be a good one. I remember Portal 2 when it first came out on xbox 360. I bought it straight away.  It literally had me sat there for HOURS on end playing on and on and on and on until i reached the end, which really did make me seel quite sad that it was all over. With tons of strategic, jam-packed levels of fun and puzzle, this game baffles the mind and can really engage the brain. I also have to admit to using guides at some points due to my overall stupidity. (i recommend HowCast on YouTube) 

Overall, Valve have really made all of the greatest games so far :D  Definitely reccomend this game to anyone who hasn't yet tried it.

Originally played this on the 360, I picked it up in the last sale. This game is still as fresh and fun as when it first dropped. For a story with a limited cast there is so much going on and lots of little bits and pieces to get your teeth into outside the testing. The story does seem a bit short, however it isn't unfullfilling and any extensions would likely be a dilution rather than an improvement.

Now with the infinite testing intiative there is a whole new multiverse of stories, levels, and tests to try out.

I would say this is definitely one of my favourite games.

One of Portal 1's minor gripes I had with it was it's run time. I was always left wanting more. Well, now I have more and I got to say, I really liked it. Without the story elements this would have been Portal 1 Extended Edition, aside from a few additions (such as the lasers and the gels), but with the story it really does feel like a satisfying ending to the Portal series, and I don't really anticipate another entry. However the worst thing this game has going for it is the major focuses on the scenery. Sometimes, it takes forever just to get to the next puzzle.

Overall, this game is almost exactly like Portal but with a bit less focus on the puzzles (still great puzzles though), an even better story and, mosty importantly, a very satisfying ending.

Portal 2 is one of the best games you'll play. Hours of mind-bending puzzles and a great story to go along with it. The puzzles in each level are hard but that just leads to a great pay off, that feeling when you finally beat the level is worth every minute you spent. You need to play this game!

This is one of the best games to get on steam. I play it all the time and never get board. This game should be $20 but is $10 which is a great deal. I recommend that you play the first portal (I recommend you find a way to get it for free because it's short and is an ok quality game, but helps you to understand this game ALOT).

Es de los mejores juegos de Valve, no por nada es el "Most Liked" de Steam. Mucho mas largo que su predecesor y mucho mas divertido, hasta puedes hacer tus propias camaras de pruebas y compartirlas con tus amigos, crear camaras para jugar en cooperativo local o solo y descargarte camaras de terceros, una obra de arte este juego.
Recomendado 10/10.

Необычная игра в жанре головоломки от первого лица. Особенно порадовала русская озвучка (я не так часто встречаю игры с голосовым русским переводом). В игре хороший сюжет, интересно следить за событиями с самого начала. Совсем не типичная головоломка. Я думаю, она понравится многим, даже тем, кто не особо любит жанр "головоломки". В общем, игра стоит того, чтобы в нее поиграть.

Да, кстати, тут же есть и кооперативный режим. Вот там уже думать придется больше... Но тем не менее, вас уже двое. Вы можете друг друга развеселить, если что. Так что, кооператив тоже удался.

Amazing, simply beautiful puzzle game. The story is intriguing at least, the co-op is brilliant and well-designed I can look at what my partner is seeing which is pretty damn sick! I am in LOVE with the soundtrack. This game will keep you going on and on until you're ravished and even then your brain will be hooked to the never ending labryinth of puzzles. Whether you are a puzzle fan or not (I am not that good with puzzles myself) I still find this game challenging and even the smartest people I know on the internet found this game challenging at best. I am blown away by the amazing job Valve has done with their newer games.

When my friend told me about Portal, and how awesome it was, I never thought it would be this would. I got both games on a sale, a bit skeptical. Now, I only play this and Skyrim. If you wonder why I've got so few hours, it's because I play this a lot at school (where the internet blocked Steam). It is a great puzzle and action game.

absolutely amazing game.even better if you already beat the first one. its such a unique game its hard to discribe in writing.its basically a puzzle game that involves using a special gun that can create 2 portals at a time. your put into many different rooms and the point is to reach the exit of these rooms using the 2 portal you create. sounds simple but its much more complicated than you think. amazing gameplay aside the story is epic. i dont want to reveal anything to anyone who hasnt played it but trust me its 100% worth it. 

recommended if:
-you enjoy puzzle games
-you like games that require thought
-you want a short game (under 10hrs)
-you want a game with a good co-op

caution:
-no replay value (unless your gonna play co-op)

一款很好的3D解谜游戏。
结合了FPS的元素以及解谜的元素，让人眼前一亮，在关卡的设置上以及沿着剧情不同风格类型的解谜都十分出众。
同时这个游戏的剧情设定也让人有一种身临其境的感觉，在通关之后有一种隐隐约约的恍惚感。
可玩性十分不错，在剧情通关之后和小伙伴一起进行的联机合作模式的解密相比单人模式的难度和有趣度是有过之而无不及。

굉장히 굉장한 게임 포탈 1의 후속작 포탈 2입니다.
포탈을 잘하신 분이라면 포탈 2는 그냥 스토리를 즐기기 위한 재미있는 게임에 불과하죠.
그렇다면 퍼즐이 쉬워서 별로일 거 같다고요? 아니요. 재미있는 게임입니다.
애퍼쳐 사이언스와 글라도스에 대한 이야기라든지 사장과 비서 그리고 암덩어리 로봇 등. 
세계관에 대한 여러 떡밥과 재밌는 에피소드들이 적당히 버무려진 샐러드 같은 게임이라 할 수 있습니다.

Шикарная игра. Шикарный сюжет. Проходишь затаив дыхание. Это игра, в которую вложили душу.
И если вы прошли сюжет, знаете его наизусть.
Если вы с другом в кооперативе все головоломки исходили вдоль и поперек.
Для Вас всегда есть дополнительный материал, созданный сообществом.
В сравнении с первым порталом , игра наделена сюжетной линией , от чего захватывает еще больше... графон не кушает глаз , локализация - супер !

Storyline? Immersive, humorous, creative, and well thought out.
Gameplay? Addictive, ingenuitive, alot of "WHOA!" moments, and the amazing feeling of completion when you finish a chamber/test/the game.

This game is by far the greatest (and probably the only) First-Person Strategy Shooter ever. I love how the storyline ties in with the first title, while also adding even more of a backstory to the foundation of such a large facility for seemingly useless testing. Not to mention the abundance of humorous characters (even the evil ones are funny) that make the game worth repeating again and again. I have recommended this game to many of my friends, and will continue to do so as long as the game exists.
99% of people approve of this game. That's 99% of approx 36,000 people.

En lo personal, uno de los mejores puzles que he jugado, sea en solitario o en cooperativo.
La historia no sólo es fascinante, sino que la comunidad creando más puzles lo hacen de un juego excelente.
En el menú de inicio incluye un editor de niveles sencillo, por lo te facilita la creación de tus propios puzles.
No hay excusas para no comprarlo incluso a precio completo.

Hay bugs forzando, robando varios cubos de los dispensadores o aprovechando el haz de luz que te empuja para romper la gravedad del juego; cosa que me gustaría que arreglasen a día de hoy.

一个偶然的机会我在合成CSgo的集换式卡牌时拿到了半价的优惠券，看了评测觉得都说是神作于是就抱着试一试的心态买了，花了四天时间通关了，这个游戏给我的感觉就是：必须神作啊！！虽然一个人单机有点孤独到可怕，周围的环境和音效有些阴森，但是环环相扣的设计和挑战思维的适宜难度以及让人猜不透的剧情是这个游戏最吸引人的地方！

First of all i'd like to say that this game is as good, maybe even better than the first one. 
The story continues from portal 1, and if you look good enough you will find some hidden eastereggs in and around the chamber from the previous game.
Also i really liked the playtime of this one, i did it in aproxamatly 7 hours, and it never bored me. 
The chambers are really good, the graphix look somewhat the same for me, but overall i really enjoyed this game.
I highly reccomend this game, since you can play it in Coop mode!

Portal 2. What a game. Absolutely genius. I bought Portal and Portal 2 together, and after I finished Portal, I knew I HAD to play Portal 2 as well. It's just, the idea is simple, shoot two portals to get from A to B. But the depth of the puzzles is amazing. Also, the humor in Portal, especially in Portal 2 is the best. It's not often that a game has me ROFL'ing in my room. 10/10 5/5 getrekt PLAY THIS GAME.
